name: Fly High - Adrenaline Vive Jetpack Racing in VR
name_original: Fly High - Adrenaline Vive Jetpack Racing in VR
description:
WARNING

YOU WILL GET MOTION SICK

This is a prototype. If people like it, it will get more development.

Current version: 0.2.6

"Two Jetpacks.
Four levels."

Fly High and race around the buildings using your jet packs in your hand like Iron Man. Master sweeping or tight turns, fast straights and narrow spaces. Fly High around the city and explore as you wish, or choose one of the four designed checkpoint races.

Training mode
You race with an indicator in order to learn the track. Progress is not saved.

Highscore mode
Test your skills and start shaving off seconds. Can you get three stars on every level?

LOCOMOTION
There is a lot of movement, so take it easy and play with care. You might feel ill!

INSTRUCTIONS
You need about 2 sqm (22 sqft) to play.
Instructions on jetpack before start.

  • You select mode by picking up a jetpack
  • Pick up jetpack with grip button
  • Trigger to fire jetpack.
  • Trigger + Touchpad press to fire boost
  • Restart with Application Button (above touchpad)

FEEDBACK
Please fill in this form!
https://goo.gl/forms/ajVT1r3xoQKNQxwH2

It will help us to make this and/or subsequent games better. If you have feedback please share it on the discussion board.

CONTACT
ca#bechno.de

CHANGELOG 0.2.6
- Fixed bug, you can now choose training mode
